thread.section_title: Soundstore Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Soundstore | www.soundstore.ie
thread.title: Mr Eamonn Ahern
thread.title_full: Soundstore reviewed by Mr Eamonn Ahern

author: Mr Eamonn Ahern
title: Mr Eamonn Ahern
text: I called to soundstore 18/01/2017. Ugis dealt with my questions on white goods needed for my new home . Ugis was a true professional to deal with he knew his products and was able to give good advise. Not only was the price fab but the fact that soundstore will store my goods at no extra cost till i need them was a real plus.
